com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache

Class Cacher<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache.Cacher<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType,StreamerExceptionType,InputExceptionType>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MemoryCacher

    public class Cacher<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which enables to cache business objects.

    The class is not thread-safe in the sense that if multiple threads attempts to modify or get the underlying cached object, no atomicity is granted.

    Since:
    2009.06.18
    Author:
    Ã‰douard Mercier

      • getValue

        public final Values.Info<BusinessObjectType> getValue(Cacher.Instructions instructions,
                                       ParameterType parameter)
                                               throws InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,
                                                      StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,
                                                      ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves the business object corresponding to the provided parameter, by specifying the routing instructions.
        Parameters:
        instructions - enables to control the source where the business object should be retrieved: either from a Business.UriInputStreamer or from an Business.IOStreamer.
        parameter - the URI corresponding to the business object
        Returns:
        a wrapper around the extracted business object, along with a retrieval timestamp and a origin.
        Throws:
        InputExceptionType - if a problem occurred while attempting to extract the business object raw data Business.InputAtom from the Business.UriInputStreamer, via the Business.UriInputStreamer.getInputStream(Object) method
        StreamerExceptionType - if a problem occurred while attempting to extract the business object raw data Business.InputAtom from the Business.IOStreamer, via the Business.InputStreamer.readInputStream(Object) method
        ParseExceptionType - if a problem occurred while parsing the business object from its Business.InputAtom raw data from the Business.UriStreamParser, via the Business.UriStreamParser.parse(ParameterType, java.io.InputStream) method
        InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception
        StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable

      • getValue

        public final Values.Info<BusinessObjectType> getValue(ParameterType parameter)
                                               throws InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,
                                                      StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,
                                                      ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception
        The data is first attempted to be retrieved from the URI stream parser (and refreshes the cache in case of success), and then from the cache.
        Throws:
        InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception
        StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable
